inventory=[{"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "wolf_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 15}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 21}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 49, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 31}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 43, "index": 37}, {"type": "brown_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft an iron_chestplate, I need to place 8 iron_ingot in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move 1 iron_ingot from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
